data.text: Ao Awurade, kae deɛ aba yɛn so;
Wɔadane yɛn agyapadeɛ ama ahɔhoɔ,
Yɛayɛ nwisiaa na yɛnni agyanom,
Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtɔ nsuo a yɛnom;
Wɔn a wɔtaa yɛn no abɛn yɛn pɛɛ;
Yɛde yɛn ho maa Misraim ne Asiria
Yɛn agyanom yɛɛ bɔne, na wɔnni hɔ bio,
Nkoa di yɛn so,
Yɛde yɛn nkwa bɔ afɔdeɛ de pɛ yɛn anoduane,
Yɛn honam adɔ sɛ fononoo.
Wɔato mmaa monnaa wɔ Sion,
Wɔkyekyere mmapɔmma nsa na wɔasɛn wɔn;
Mmeranteɛ yɛ adwuma den wɔ ayuoyammoɔ so;
Mpanimfoɔ ntena kuropɔn apono ano bio;
Ahosɛpɛ afiri yɛn akoma mu;
Ahenkyɛ afiri yɛn tiri so.
Yei enti yɛn akoma atɔ piti,
wɔ Sion bepɔ a ada mpan
Wo, Ao Awurade, di ɔhene afebɔɔ;
Adɛn enti na wo werɛ firi yɛn daa yi?
Ka yɛn bata wo ho bio, Ao, Awurade, na yɛatumi aba wo nkyɛn;
agye sɛ wapo yɛn koraa
